title: New: EDDI LINES – GIGANTIC
body: Contrary to popular belief, capitalizing your band name does not make the music brash nor abrasive, in fact it’s pretty much the opposite with New York songstress **EDDI LINES**. A dwindling piano ballad, that’s as sleek and resplendent as possible without slipping to the overproduced Adele category, _GIGANTIC_ has all the makings of a ‘blog-hit’. Ending on the poignant line _‘I’ll crawl out of this hole, soon enough, take my ring off’_, it’s both devastating and enthralling all at once. GIGANTIC by EDDI LINES
